name: Blood Curling
description:
The game jam prompt was "curling", but I added rockets, guns, and zombies.

At least you're still sliding a circular object around on ice, giving it spin to curl its path, aiming for targets where you get more points for being near the centre.

There's also a "sweeper field" that lowers friction and curl. I guess it's kind of Asteroids-esque?

Anyway, here's my first published game. It was created in about 5 (and a half) days using Godot. Feel free to enjoy and/or criticise.
